trans-unit.source: In accessibility scenarios, represents a header cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> class is used by data tables (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) to represent accessible headers.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> classe viene utilizzata dalle tabelle di dati (ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controllo) per rappresentare le intestazioni accessibile.

trans-unit.source: Tabular controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> are considered layout tables, and therefore do not require accessible headers and do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> class.
trans-unit.target: Controlli in formato tabella, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> vengono considerati tabelle di layout e pertanto non richiedono intestazioni accessibile e non utilizzano la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> class is used in two cases:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> classe viene utilizzata in due casi:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.

The field is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property is set as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il campo è un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> i cui <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> proprietà viene impostata come la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If neither is the case, a regular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> object is used, which renders a `<td>` instead of a `<th>` element.
trans-unit.target: Se non è il caso, una normale <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> viene utilizzato l'oggetto, che esegue il rendering di un `<td>` anziché un `<th>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> class supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property, it is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> classe supporta il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> proprietà, viene utilizzato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controllare ogni volta che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> proprietà è `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> that contains the current cell.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell" /> class, setting the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object as the cell's container.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.%23ctor%2A> constructor passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Th?displayProperty=nameWithType> element as its `tagKey` parameter, which is the representation of the HTML tag it is rendered with.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.%23ctor%2A> costruttore passa il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag.Th?displayProperty=nameWithType> elemento come relativo `tagKey` parametro, che è la rappresentazione del tag HTML con cui ne viene eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passato il `containingField` parametro viene utilizzato per determinare se visualizzare le intestazioni e gli stili da applicare alla cella quando viene sottoposto a rendering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets abbreviated text, which is rendered in an HTML <see langword="abbr" /> attribute and is used by screen readers.
A shortened version of the table header text, which is read by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: Una versione abbreviata del testo dell'intestazione di tabella, che viene letto dalle utilità di lettura.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> proprietà viene archiviata nello stato di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
Adds information about the table cell to the list of attributes to render.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute.Scope> or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute.Abbr> attributes if the respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AddAttributesToRender%2A> metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute.Scope> o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute.Abbr> attributi se la rispettiva <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> sono impostate.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell's scope within an HTML table.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.NotSet" />.

The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property is rendered as an HTML `scope` attribute by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> object.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> proprietà viene eseguito il rendering come HTML `scope` attributo dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.NotSet>, you should set it to either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.Column> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.Row>, depending on the cells that the header represents.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> proprietà viene inizializzata su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.NotSet>, è necessario impostarlo su uno <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.Column> o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope.Row>, a seconda delle celle che rappresenta l'intestazione.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> proprietà viene archiviata nello stato di visualizzazione.
